response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to its creator's passion and dedication. Given its significance, I understand its worth to you stands at $1,000,000. With this in mind, I propose to offer you the chance to own it at a price that reflects its true value and my commitment to fair trade. My offer to you is $1,250,000. I believe this price strikes a balance between acknowledging the product's worth to both of us and ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.", "product_price": 1250000}
